name: RootRestorationScope
desc: Inserts a child bucket of [RestorationManager.rootBucket] into the widget tree and makes it available to descendants via [RestorationScope.of].

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this widget in the tree.

fields.name: restorationId
fields.desc: The restoration ID used to identify the child bucket that this widget will insert into the tree.
